My reason being, it was on clearance and I ended up paying $181 for it. I got the last one and it was the previous demo but once everything was clear it is amazing! I love the size and the screen is bright and very hd. The only thing I have noticed wrong so far is the keyboard. It lags and it takes a lot for it to recognise the "h" key. But I can live with that science I'm not using this for productivity. Otherwise great product.
Reviews.Title: I love it!

Reviews.Author: Andrewleffel
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9" is outstanding. I have owned the first generation kindle fire and this is 10 times better. The sound is amazing, it sounds lime surround sound. The front camera is perfect for Skype. Also, the boon store, app store, and music store is non expensive and has a huge variety. I recommend this tablet to anyone.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"

Reviews.Author: susan
Reviews.Content: The Kindle was everything we expected, however it didn't come with directions.  When i did contact for help, CSR was extremely helpful and patient.
Reviews.Title: We love it!

Reviews.Author: Lonnie Erickson
Reviews.Content: Love love love it. Wish I had bought a Kindle Fire HD 8.9 a loooooong time ago. Thank you Kindle Fire plus your tech support people.
Reviews.Title: Gotta have to be happy.

Reviews.Author: Aphrodite Vassilatos
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing e reader, everything is so big and bright. The screen is big enough for me to read, surf the internet, and check my emails, it's portable and lightweight to carry and it comes with many cool features.  I would highly recommend this product for everyone.
Reviews.Title: Approved And Satisfied Kindle Fire Owner

Reviews.Author: stephennie meister
Reviews.Content: I got this for a christmas gift after misplacing my regular sized kindle fire.  The bigger size is really great.  I love that it takes pictures and I can plug it into my laptop and download.
Reviews.Title: Really liking the size of it.

Reviews.Author: Carolyn's corner
Reviews.Content: I do like the bigger kindle however it has taken me a bit to get used to the size when playing games. Our grandchildren love to play games on it. Thank you Amazon for giving me money from older, smaller kindle fire for upgrade.
Reviews.Title: upgraded to bigger kindle fire.

Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: Great tablet. I like it better than my laptop. Well worth the price. SUPER FAST OVER WIFI. Only drawback is you can't access goggle apps.
Reviews.Title: AWESOME !!!

Reviews.Author: Robin L.
Reviews.Content: I really love my Kindle FIre HD.  When it arrived I couldn't wait to open it and get started. It was easy to set up and I have had no problems with it. At first I ordered a supersonic and I ended up sending it back due to sticking and just not responding to anything I done. Now the Kindle has it beT hands down by all means. It is fast on startup and also my speed for the internet is real fast with no problems at all. The sound is exceptionally great and the picture quality is awesome. And as for shopping through the Kindle it is fast and easy. I am pleased with the apps offered and the games are awesome. I highly recommend this Kindle FIre HD to anyone any age. I think you will be amazed at the quality of this product and the price. And as for email it is great. I use yahoo email and it was so easy to set up and get started. So go ahead and order this I guarantee you will not be disappointed. As for customer service with your Kindle you will be exceptionally pleased. I did have to contact them and I was hooked up to them in a matter of seconds and everything was resolved fast and easy. Thanks Amazon for delivering a great product and great customer service.
Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle FIre HD 8.9

Reviews.Author: Regular Joe
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th. Kindle, will get#5 when this wears out!Better than the previous tablet by far!If you are thinking of buying this, stop thinking and just buy it
Reviews.Title: yeah!

Reviews.Author: slwells
Reviews.Content: I love Kindle.  I have 3  ...well 4 counting the Kindle app in my tablet.  I have an original Kindle, Kindle Fire and now the HD.I use all 3 for different purposes.  HD is nice and clear. i really don't stream much video but it is beautifuly clear and vibrant.It is easy to use and easy to load new books or apps. 3 of my co-workers bought one after they saw mine.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9

Reviews.Author: L Pettaway
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent product, unlike the original, which I had to replace three times because of charging issues, this one stays charged.  The screen is easy to read since it is larger.  I have only had it 2 months, so I am hoping it will not have the same issues as the original kindle.  I would suggest its purchase.
Reviews.Title: Kindle HD 8.9

Reviews.Author: K. Staggs
Reviews.Content: This is a gift to my 15 year old grandson. I bought the bigger size as his younger brothers have the smaller 7 inch ones. He really likes the size and the case which was the HD 8.9 standing leather case. He wanted the keyboard that would work with it just so it would look more like a computer. Ordered the Ionic bluetooth keyboard stand that came with the case and he really likes the look and feel of it.
Reviews.Title: This was  bought as a gift.

Reviews.Author: Montina Carter
Reviews.Content: I never thought about a Kindle Fire until my sister kept raving about how she wanted one.  I started researching them and pricing them.  I used part of my income tax money to purchase it.  I am now hooked.  I cannot go anywhere without it.  I can do everything on it.  Without any warning about a month ago, my Kindle Fire just went dead and would not recharge.  I called Customer Service.  They tried some troubleshooting.  It was unsuccessful.  I received a new Kindle Fire by UPS 2 day service - no questions asked.  I was able to return my defective Kindle Fire by UPS at no cost to me.  I was able to access almost all of my information from my previous Kindle Fire onto my new Kindle Fire.  Now  I love my second Kindle Fire.
Reviews.Title: I Love Love Love My Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: R. Masten "Groak"
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle mostly for movies. The larger screen and bigger memory make this unit more fun to watch.I don't read much but all other functions seem to work very well.
Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: I like this kindle a lot, but I don't love it.  I had an original kindle fire, which is smaller & easier to handle.  When I received this Kindle, I felt like it was just too big.  I've been using it for a few months now & have adjusted, but I still would prefer the smaller size for reading in bed.  The graphics are fantastic and the speakers are much better than the original.  My only big complaint is that it goes dark sometimes for no reason & I have to flip it up or down or press in the button to get the screen back.  This did not happen with my original kindle.  I have not investigated why it does this, I just keep putting up with it!
Reviews.Title: great clarity

Reviews.Author: Lynne Slagle
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband for Christmas, as he has remained immune to all things electronic including the computer.  Now he is on it constantly, much to my dismay, as I like to get my hands on it occasionally.  He watches movies, listens to music, reads newspapers, plays solitaire, bridge and Sudoku, and now has an email account.  He is absolutely amazed at the quality of display in HD.  Would recommend the Kindle Fire HD to anyone, even one who has no background with electronics.
Reviews.Title: My husband loves it!

Reviews.Author: Lisa Prather
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it!  I like that it is bigger than my kindle, so internet use is much easier to see.  Love the lightweight feel and it is very easy to navigate around in.  Highly recommend!!
Reviews.Title: Husband's new toy

Reviews.Author: tarheel
Reviews.Content: great device, each year I try to update my kindle and by far this is the best yet. thanks amazon for all of your products and support team.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9 h.d.

Reviews.Author: bjky2000
Reviews.Content: I had a Kindle Fire 7". It wound not turn on unless on the charger. I contacted the online chat, the guy that helped me was of great service. I was able to trade my old one in on a New Kindle Fire HD 8.9". I had bought another tablet and was not happy with it, so I returned it and was back with my Kindle Fire once again. Thanks for your great customer team and great products.
Reviews.Title: Great customer service!

Reviews.Author: birdlady
Reviews.Content: First thing I like about it is the color and graphics. I always get 4G so I can download easily without being near my computer. I also like the fact I can choose which Kindle to download a new book to (Kindle 1 or Kindle 2). I really got this because between books or to take a break from reading I like to play games to relax and clear my head. So this is really more for games than reading although I am able to use Cloud to import a book I have on my other Kindle to read if I'm away from Kindle number 1. The down side is it doesn't sync to the location I am at in Kindle 1 so I have to fast forward to find where I left off. Also I find some apps have trouble opening or responding but I don't know if it's the Kindle or the app. So far I am still unable to do any in-app purchasing but can't figure out why. Overall I like it and am glad I made the purchase.
Reviews.Title: Compliments my earlier Kindle

Reviews.Author: K. Graham
Reviews.Content: I had the original Kindle but my charging port stopped working so I upgraded to the HD 8.9. It's a big difference. I love the bigger screen cause when you read with it horizontally you get both book pages just like a real book. It also has more storage for apps than the older one had. Some things work differently but very easily figured out.
Reviews.Title: Christmas Present

Reviews.Author: Billie Woodall
Reviews.Content: I really love this version of Kindle. I purchased it for the purpose of having the book read to me at times. My only complaint is that it is not user friendly for the elderly who did not grow up using Kindles and other things in this category. I had to call many times to find out how to get around. I had 2 other Kindles before this one and they were not easy to get around in, but I had friends th help me on the first two. I hope to get better acquainted with this Kindle in the next year. I buy and read books, buy and play games. I listen to music.  A book of instructions would have been great. I know there are some instructions inside the Kindle, but it is hard switching back and forth trying to find out what to do.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9

Reviews.Author: patrick
Reviews.Content: Advertized as better than the ipad. It's not an ipad. It is a little less than an ipad and priced that way. Actually more of a large android phone without the phone part and with less apps.
Reviews.Title: not an ipad air and priced that way

Reviews.Author: Odette Evans
Reviews.Content: I wish it were a little lighter in weight. Color not quite as vivid as I expected  but all in all pleased.
Reviews.Title: Ratings on Kindle

Reviews.Author: Tara Kaufman
Reviews.Content: This is the best thing since sliced bread!!! I love this Kindle. I wasn't sure how I was gonna like reading on a tablet and not in an actual book, but I really like it!!!! and I love how much cheaper you can get books, and how they down load right away. No more buying online and waiting or trying to find one at a store!!
Reviews.Title: Obsessed with my Kindle!!

Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: Cannot get flash player to install, some other apps just won't work on the Kindle Fire, it is  a known issue, may be sending back
Reviews.Title: Flash Player won't install

Reviews.Author: DR Beard
Reviews.Content: A really nice product at a great price. This is my 3rd Kindle and the improvement is unbelievable. I am only using a limited number of functions; reading books and email and I am still very impressed.D. BeardJacksonville, FL
Reviews.Title: Great Product

Reviews.Author: Jocelyn
Reviews.Content: The power button is very hard to find not to mention turning it off.  The screen looks Awesome with vivid colors. Kinda hard to navigate but the item keeps turning on and off on its own, so had to return as defective!So over all we were NOT happy with this product.
Reviews.Title: Not happy! Power Button Very Hard To?

Reviews.Author: Jayne Hopkins
Reviews.Content: I have loved the whole Kindle line from my first one....the keyboard.....then the 7 inch Fire the day it was released and now my upgrade to a larger unit. It is heavier often I have to prop it to read later at night, but I still like the larger screen.
Reviews.Title: Great choice

Reviews.Author: AmazonJunkie
Reviews.Content: Love every bit of this device! While I was very dissapointed to hear that the device did not come with a wall charger I was happy with the price compaired to other tablets and loved the excessiability of the tablet itself! The shipping speed was extrodinarily fast.
Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle Fire HD

Reviews.Author: SNOlsen "snolsen"
Reviews.Content: They say that this was a refurb. You couldn't tell it by the way it looked. Not a blemish on the entire unit.
Reviews.Title: Great Deal

Reviews.Author: Thespian
Reviews.Content: Now I know what everyone's been talking about. Really enjoy using it! Easy to use, great for reading, and sure helps cut down on sitting in fron tof teh PC when all I want to do is read or play some solitaire. Am also enjoying many of the other apps that are available for entertainment and productivity. I am glad I opted for the larger size, makes it nice for streaming video too.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Brian Finn
Reviews.Content: My whole family loves the Kindle. Fantastic equipment. Extremely fast, Picture and Video are Amazing. Highly recommend. Especially for the price
Reviews.Title: Great for the Entire Family

Reviews.Author: Mohammed
Reviews.Content: The battery keeps dying after several weeks and this is my 2nd tablet! I maintain the kindle very well and I do not charge it unless the battery in very low
Reviews.Title: Battery dies on me

Reviews.Author: PCG
Reviews.Content: I purchased primarily to watch videos off-line. The product description said this model included free Prime video download at the time I placed the order but it does not. Checked with customer service and they confirmed this model does not include Prime download. I noticed that the product description has since been changed. Also, screen is very "jittery" when I try to scroll up and down, not smooth like other tablets I have tried. Not sure if this was specific to the tablet I received or a problem with all the Kindle’s. Regardless, returned to Amazon.
Reviews.Title: No Free Prime Download on this Model

Reviews.Author: PretendRN "pretendrn"
Reviews.Content: I love it!  For a fraction of the price it can do many things as well as an Ipad or I phone without  a monthly bill.  I couldn't ask for a better reader with a great sound system for music and more apps than anyone needs!  Plus, of course, millions of books at very reasonable prices.  Just what I would expect from Amazon, my favorite store!
Reviews.Title: I Love It!!

Reviews.Author: Booknation
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a replacement for my boyfriend's prior kindle. He purchased the original kindle first when it first became available. He seems very happy with the improved screen (SD to HD) and the larger screen size makes screening tv shows and movies even nicer. It is the only tablet he recommends.
Reviews.Title: Kindle HD

Reviews.Author: Oldsoldier22 "Chief3lw"
Reviews.Content: The Fire HD 8.9 is a great upgrade for me from the Fire 2d gen 7". Though a young senior I found the 7" screen tired my eyes when reading a lot. Also web surfing seemed a bit cramped on the 7". The HD 8.9 really solved the reading issue for me right away I experienced the difference. Also the 16gb of internal memory is great to have I can load more music onboard to play as I travel outside the internet area not wanting to connect to a site I don't know, no viruses wanted here. The four stars is due to Silk for some reason it seems the browser is sluggish at times during web searching. I have a dual band cable modem and router in close proximity to my office area and still I get the "this page can't be viewed" unexpectedly. So Silk needs some work I am not one to want to use a third party browser I don't like the chance of viruses, so Amazon get on the stick and improve Silk. I didn't go for the HDX because of the price and I don't Skype nor Facebook my old friends barely have a PC so cameras are not important to me. Still the Fire HD 8.9 is a great upgrade and now the price is great too! Get it if you're thinking of upgrading!
Reviews.Title: Great upgrade from the 7"

Reviews.Author: s guenther
Reviews.Content: Product is ok to use if u want it for reading and games.....Browsing the web, actual computing functions not so much. This is my second, "upgraded" to an HD 32 bit. See no difference except for screen size. Seems web browsing and t he keyboard are still cumbersome. Tried it 2 times, guess u get what u pay for.
Reviews.Title: save your money and buy an actual tablet

Reviews.Author: Brax
Reviews.Content: Amazon has proven that they can definitely make a product that can give the iPad a run for it's money. The Kindle has a few things going for it when compared to the iPad.1) PRICE! - The kindle is so much cheaper than the iPad and this is probably what leads so many people to it initially.2) Android! - I've never been a fan of IOS, and the Android operating system has always been more user friendly in my eyes.3) Free books - When you have a Kindle & you're a member of Amazon Prime you get access to a huge library of free books.-Now that we've gone over the pros, I would be remiss if I didn't mention the cons and how to avoid them.1) Amazon tries to lock down their products. - Yes the iPad is similar, but Amazon does it more and if you don't root it's extremely annoying.2) Again, unrooted, you're forced to use the Amazon appstore instead of the google play store. This is a problem if you've previously purchased apps on the Play store and expect to use them on your kindle. - Again - Root your Kindle!3) No GPS!? - The iPads all have GPS for use with sky maps, maps, and apps that need a location to be used.. To save money Amazon left this out... It gets annoying on sideloaded or rooted apps sometimes.-Most of the problems you'll experience on the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 can be avoided/gotten around by rooting. While Amazon does not suggest this, and even go as far as to discourage it, it REALLY makes the Kindle a fully functioning tablet and a GREAT alternative to the iPad.
Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: Crettia
Reviews.Content: I studied about the different types and chose this one.  So far I really like it.  THe only thing that throws me is the space button and the  go back arrow at the bottom  are too close together.  I  hit the go back button half the time instead of the space button.  Otherwise I am getting along OK.  for someone that knows nothing about the workings of a tablet.
Reviews.Title: I like it!

Reviews.Author: Elisha Hawk "Elisha"
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HD 8.9", Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special OffersSo having tried the others, I can definitely say that the Kindle Fire HD is hands down the best tablet for kids. We bought our four kids ages 7, 5.5, 5.5, and 3.5 iPods for Christmas because they were constantly wanting our iPhones and the iPad. The problem is, though, that the kids became even more annoying - constantly asking for new apps. With Kindle Fire, parents can pay monthly (it's like 6 or 7 dollars per household per month) and each kid gets their own profile, fully stocked with Kindle's library of books, videos and apps. When you click on the profile, you are automatically locked in, and it looks just like any other profile, you can click on books, or apps, or videos. Amazon stocks the profile with age appropriate content, based on birthday. Parents have the option of adding to the content if they want, or removing content, if they want. And, the kindle gives them time warnings and locks them out after the designated time.  Last night before dinner, my 7 year old was reading his library book about the sabertooth tiger. He then had a lot of questions about the La Brea tar pits. We found a documentary on the internet and he, our 5.5 year old and our 3.5 year old were able to watch it while we cooked. It was awesome. Now, of course, you can do this with the iPad, iPod or iPhone, but I sure like handing them the kindle with their Profile already selected!
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD bests iPod and iPad with its Kindle Free Time profiles for kids!

Reviews.Author: zach
Reviews.Content: I really love the Kindle Fire HD and what made it even better was when I received it in the mail all my apps, programs and music was downloaded for me. I especially like the Bluetooth feature and the camera. Overall it was a worthwhile investment and a spectacular gift from myself....
Reviews.Title: Kindle Kire HD

Reviews.Author: Sharon Holcomb
Reviews.Content: I love it and am looking forward to having the new one that will be available in December.  What I like best is that I can take it anywhere and be able to use it.  I was able to get a good buy with AT&T;, which takes over when I am not at home under our wireless.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9 4G LTE Wireless

Reviews.Author: Didier C
Reviews.Content: I originally had the Kindle Fire; which I kept for about a year. This was probably one of the best purchases I've ever made; I went from reading very little to reading a book a week. I was originally very impressed with Amazon's Top 100 Free Books and was almost exclusively reading those. I also found other uses for my tablet, such as watching Netflix, HBO Go, Surfing the Web and playing the occasional game/app. I went on to switch to the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 because I wanted to try something with a larger screen.Pros: Awesome for reading and searching for new books (cannot get any other tablet that will match it in this category); Great for streaming videos from Netflix, Hulu, HBO or any other video app (never experienced any issues); the brightness, volume, WIFI functionality are all pretty good as well. Battery is amazing! I feel like I use it all the time and don't have to charge it that often.Cons: I'm still not a HUGE fan of the carousel layout (although this isn't a make or break factor for me); Silk (the web search app) is not the greatest, I find myself having to close and re-open windows sometimes because I'm having issues.Overall - 9/10 for me; I have an iphone so I considered an ipad; but I love reading and streaming video and this option lets me do both for cheaper.
Reviews.Title: Great Tablet - All Around!

Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: I think I'm sending it back. I was so excited to get it. It keeps freezing up and powering its self on and off. I can't even be on it one time without either one happening :(
Reviews.Title: Freezing up and powering off and on

Reviews.Author: Robolivia "Bob"
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is everything I read and heard about and more.This is one great device I am still finding new things to try I love it
Reviews.Title: My 2nd Kindle

Reviews.Author: B. Goddard
Reviews.Content: Had doubts about the refurbished product but so far it has been perfect.  Love the bright and clear screen.  Already have told friends about it.
Reviews.Title: Kindle is fun.

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire Hd is such an awesome tool!! I use it all the time & never leave home without it!!
Reviews.Title: I love it

Reviews.Author: sjm
Reviews.Content: So far we are doing well but still have problems finding things because it is new!  Picture is great!  Screen size nice!  Very happy so far!
Reviews.Title: Good deal

Reviews.Author: DiannaJJ
Reviews.Content: I love  the size of the Kindle HD 8.9". I am very impressed with this item having had the regular 7 inch Kindle Fire previously. Happy customer!
Reviews.Title: Love it!!

Reviews.Author: Magic Ball
Reviews.Content: game wobbles. shaking going on, had trouble downloading. Still can not open game.too many words required for feed back
Reviews.Title: not happy right now

Reviews.Author: Clau Puig
Reviews.Content: Great product, I had some problems at first to configure since I'm not in the US, but I wrote to the service and they solved the problem in just a day. Thanks a lot!!!
Reviews.Title: Excelente

Reviews.Author: Katia
Reviews.Content: That's just everything we needed. All our family enjoys Fire - from 3 y.o. to 60 y.o. It's really simple and helpful, you can play, watch something, read books and it's really, really cheap for all that it can do. Thank you, Amazon!
Reviews.Title: The best thing I've ever had

Reviews.Author: stanley granger
Reviews.Content: This is just what my daughter wanted and she is very happy with it.  She was very impressed with it and seems to really enjoy it.  I would recommend this to all.
Reviews.Title: great gift

Reviews.Author: Laura Beere
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup and  fun to useLight can take any whereThoroughly reccomend won't want to be without my kindle
Reviews.Title: wouldn't be without my kindle

Reviews.Author: Nunkuri "Nunkuri"
Reviews.Content: After reviewing all similar tablets (both available internationally and locally here in Australia), I decided on this one. A bit of an issue to set it up to work properly here, but it's such a great product that getting it here was worth it. The reviews of the sound and vision quality are completely accurate - both fantastic.
Reviews.Title: Awesome!

Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: I had the first kindle and had a problem with charging I called Amazon. They set me up with new Kindle 8.9.
Reviews.Title: I love it

Reviews.Author: Josephine Harnish
Reviews.Content: I love the bigger size. It is easier to handle. The bigger screen is easier to see. Easy online access.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd 8.9

Reviews.Author: Karla Marshall
Reviews.Content: From start to finish, all went well with the purchase of my new Kindle. Tried to order on-line without success so was assisted over the phone. All were so helpful and suggested I purchase the new Kindle and return my old Kindle to receive credit toward the 8.9". Received the new Kindle as promised and was notified when my old one was received. Will definitely order through Amazon again. Thank you very much!
Reviews.Title: Newest Kindle.

Reviews.Author: C. A. Macdonald
Reviews.Content: Had the 7" Kindle Fire loved it.  Saw the great price on this one and ordered it and love it even more.  Great price.
Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: Barbara Holt
Reviews.Content: Both my husband and I both love this Kindle Fire.  I waited to purchase because I wanted to make sure there was time to work the bugs out and also to be able to get the price down for the Wireless.  So far I have been able to do all that I want to do with it.  Great screen clarity when reading, sound is great also.  Clear color - awesome - I think I will have to get my husband one for games though!
Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!

Reviews.Author: Maggie Maestra "avid reader"
Reviews.Content: I do love my Fire, and I continue to read on my Kindle keyboard.  I use the Fire a lot to play games which are addictive, and I like to check my e-mails on it instead of going to the computer.  My gripe about Kindle products is that they have minimum instructions!  What happened to an old fashioned instruction book that tells you everything and how to do it?  It's hard to read some instructional tid bit on the device and try to implement it at the same time and then try to find that item again in the instructions.  It doesn't tell me a lot of the things I'd like to know.  When you push the ON button and "Kindle Fire" lights up on the screen, do you just wait till the screen saver shows up, or do you push it again?  Why is it sometimes so hard to close the book you're reading and get the Home icon to show up?  Is it slow, or am I just impatient?  Should you always go to Home before touching the OFF button?  Is it better to plug in in each night and let it charge all night, or is that too long to leave it plugged in?  Is it better to charge it frequently or to wait till it is very low?  Some things can be frustrating to non-techies who are not as familiar with all the new devices and would really like to be walked through some of the options and techniques.  If I download a song, can I transfer it to my computer and listen to it there, or is it only heard on my Fire?
Reviews.Title: constant companion

Reviews.Author: Millicent Hobirk
Reviews.Content: I'm really happy I upgraded my Kindle fire. I really like the feel of this lighter version even though it's bigger. I have enjoyed watching shows I hadn't seen using my prime membership and the bigger page is nicer for reading.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: FinnThorup
Reviews.Content: I enjoy my kindle very much.Pros. Does everything I expected it to do.Cons. First kindle had to return under warranty due to battery overheating. No problem to return.On/off switch to easy to bump while reading, maybe a slider type switch would have been better.I would have given 5 stars but I do hate that on/off switch.
Reviews.Title: my second kindle

Reviews.Author: S.M. "The Librarian"
Reviews.Content: Wonderful product--I have the smaller first generation Kindle Fire and loved it so I wanted to upgrade.  My brother bot a mini ipad with 4 G and his more expensive product is no better than mine.  I bot my Mom a newer Kindle Fire HD 7" and she loves it--she wont use a computer but loves the Kindle Fire.  I watch movies (which are truly amazing in quality), play games, keep up email, read books and surf.  one of the best purchases I have made--and for half the regular price of a non refurbished one.
Reviews.Title: I was nervous about the refurbished part but I have no complaints

Reviews.Author: lovemyfamily
Reviews.Content: My family owns a 7" Kindle Fire HD, this 8.9" Fire HD and a 1st-gen iPad.  Granted, it's not apples to apples comparing the new 8.8" Fire HD to my iPad but it's what I got.  The app content on Apple is still superior to that of Amazon (Amazon app content isn't terrible...just not in the same vicinity as Apple).  I'm not a computer nerd but I'm not sure why Amazon hasn't been more aggressive with this.  That being said, the 8.9" Fire HD has a very high quality feel to it.  The screen is really crisp, it's easy to use, watching videos look amazing, etc.  Also easy for kids to use and navigate.If the price was the same, I'd buy iPad's.  But...given the HUGE price difference between the two (a full-size 8.9" Fire HD is roughly $50 LESS than an iPad MINI....let alone the full-size iPad's) I just can't justify more iPad purchases.  The minute Amazon figures out the app situation there will be precisely ZERO reason to look elsewhere.
Reviews.Title: Fantastic tablet

Reviews.Author: Deanna Brion
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my first Kindel but this one is such a wonder. I have been playing with it and getting some books. It does every thing but the dishes!
Reviews.Title: Can't live without one of these Kindles

Reviews.Author: Judy Werner
Reviews.Content: This was my first time using any kind of tablet, etc.With the exception of a very simple cell phone used for sending Textsand my home computer used for emails I am definitely not computer  smart.I found the Kindle Fire easy to use and even though I had to figure it out without instructions.I am enjoying a few of the things available to me that I enjoy.I have many more things available such as picture taking - Skype - movies and music but I am hesitant to go any further until Iget more comfortable with the settings.I definitely encourage anyone in my position to go for it and enjoy the Kindle Fire.Amazing screen pictures etc.I hesitated for 2 months before I made my purchase and I am so happy I made the right choice !
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: jack
Reviews.Content: great tabletgreat great ggreat  kid's love it , worth every penny and more , great features great color easy to use awsome product
Reviews.Title: fantastic tablet

Reviews.Author: Christine Carrillo
Reviews.Content: What can i say other than "I LOVE IT". I am so happy with it that i recommend it to all my friends and family:)
Reviews.Title: Love my new kindle

Reviews.Author: MCC
Reviews.Content: By far the best tablet on the market that doesn't make phone calls. The screen is huge and clear and bright. You can do everything (but phone calls) on this tablet as you can on $500+ tablets. I'll never buy another again.
Reviews.Title: I use this for EVERYTHING!!!

Reviews.Author: JillSchoenleber
Reviews.Content: Love my new kindle. Better picture easier to use and finally i can read in sunlight!!! I think everyone else will love it too.  The only downside to having the ability to take photos is you have nothing to look through, so alot of bloopers.  Otherwise I gie it a 9 out of 10.
Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle HD

Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This was a purchase I'm happy I made. I like the Kindle Fire HD very much. I did find it harder to navigate than an Ipad and App store is easier to use than Google.  But overall a nice tablet and two hundred dollars cheaper than the IPad
Reviews.Title: nice tablet for the money

Reviews.Author: krystal cardwell
Reviews.Content: igive this kindle hd a 5 star because its nice  and big.i play this more then my laptop. i haveall the games for me and the kids. plus if you in college this is a great way to save money. you can carry everything on here. this is what i wanted so i got it. when i travel i look up diff spots on my kindle for me and myfriends. buy itpromise you love it.
Reviews.Title: love my new kindle with all my heart

Reviews.Author: Katrina Faust
Reviews.Content: I have been very happy with my new Kindle, however, one of the reasons I bought the Kindle was for trips like the one I'm currently on.  My mother had surgery and she and my father live in another state.  They live in a retirement community and the TV in the house is right by their bedroom.  I spend my day taking care of her and the house and was looking forward to seeing a movie when I went to bed on my new HD Kindle, a little down time for myself to recharge.  I attempted to download two movies before leaving my house and was unable.  I called the help line and was still unable.  I waited till I got to my parents house and attempted the download again.  Still no luck even with calling the support line.  They are sending me a new Kindle to arrive on Monday.  I leave on Wednesday.  So, I am a little disappointed in the problem with the download because this was a perfect moment for me to use the movie portion of the device.  I choose to take the kindle vs my laptop to save space, which did its job there, however, I have not been able to use it since Thursday or Friday when we reset the Kindle.  There should be something that also does not generate e-mails asking me to rate the movies that I have yet to watch.  Reminds me of the disappointment.Happy i bought a brand new device, so they are replacing it.  Thank you for that.  Hope there are no more problems.
Reviews.Title: download disappointment

Reviews.Author: Echoes "Electric Eye"
Reviews.Content: Although the hardware on this device is comparable to that in $400+ tablets, Amazon decided to cripple the Android OS that it runs. I understand that this is a sound business decision,  but can't help feeling shortchanged as a consumer.But... there is a way! With a little effort, you can install Jelly Bean 4.3 on it (i.e the unfettered latest version of Android).Must say that I am extremely pleased with the results. The 8.9inch form factor and the weight make it ideal for reading; try holding an ipad in your hand for 3 hrs.
Reviews.Title: Powerful hardware, but the SW is a disappointment

Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle fire HD 8.9". I've watched videos and enjoy the picture quality. The sound is pretty good, too. I haven't tried to attach it to my television, yet. I need to buy another cable for that. Reading is a pleasure and I like that I can modify the lighting. My Kindle eReader is about five years old and developing problems so I wanted to replace it. Checking email and other web sites is nice for traveling when I don't want to lug a laptop.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Kathy A.
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire because I have the Kindle paper white without the lighted background and I read at night and in the car at dark.  The Kindle fire serves the purposes I purchased it for.  I did struggle at first with trying to borrow books and movies from the lending library on Amazon; however, once I figured it out it is great!
Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the money.

Reviews.Author: smith
Reviews.Content: I love it except I wish I would have gotten the one with more GB !!!!! It still fits in my purse & I take it where ever I go !!!!!
Reviews.Title: It goes where I go !!!

Reviews.Author: Kathleen Rahenkamp
Reviews.Content: It reads the books to you, you can put things from your pc on to the kindle and from your kindle to the pc
Reviews.Title: I like my kindle

Reviews.Author: TB "T.Brown"
Reviews.Content: I think it's a great buy if your a reader! I love to read, but I like to google, facebook, pinterest, and shop and this is the perfect tablet at the perfect price! Amazon has been great to work with!
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: rc
Reviews.Content: The display is crystal clear.  Occasionally, while streaming video, the picture gets blotchy.  I suspect it is not the fault of the Kindle, but the wireless systems that are available to me.  On a good wireless connection, the Kindle was flawless.The good parts:The display is wonderful.The display keyboard is actually usable in portrait; even better in landscape.Books, websites, pictures, music and audible books start instantly.  This machine is fast!The cons:I cant find any, but there is an irritant and that is the placement of the USB and HDMI ports especially the USB port.  There is no way I can find to prop up the Kindle in order to use it in Landscape while charging. It is a nuisance, but not a flaw,Given the availability of Wi-Fi , I wonder if I might have spent the extra cost for additional memory than for the 4G LTE.  I have been in a dozen fringe cellular reception areas since I bought the Kindle.  If my Verizon cell phone showed no bars, the Kindle AT&T; showed no bars, either.  In my travels, the AT&T; signal dropped out much earlier with only one exception:  If you are heading to the eastern end of Nantucket, this is the cellular connection to have.If you buy this Kindle, you will not be disappointed.
Reviews.Title: This is a beauty!

Reviews.Author: Kay
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough good things about my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9" Dolby Audio, Dual Band Wi-Fi, 32GB.  What a huge improvement from my 7 inch Kindle Fire.  I find myself using this every day.
Reviews.Title: Fantastic!

Reviews.Author: A. J. Bergeron "avajo57"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire - nothing more needs to be said.  Brilliant screen, convenience at my fingertips.  Love Love Love! It speaks for itself.
Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: Roc
Reviews.Content: I would recommend the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" LTE Wireless to anyone and everyone.  Sound and screen are excellent.  The guide on the kindle on how to use was very easy.
Reviews.Title: Best buy I have made

Reviews.Author: Deborah Brochhausen
Reviews.Content: From the original to the Fire HD this is by far the best. It is like having a tablet. It is just the right size and does just about everything, Love it!
Reviews.Title: Best Yet!

Reviews.Author: Mr. David Maguire
Reviews.Content: I have WiFi connectivity no problem, but every time I try to open Silk (the browser) it tells me "Silk is not responding." So no Web surfing, though if I choose to shop Amazon or use one of the other built-in apps (like email) I can access the Web.Meanwhile, I gave AT&T; $30 for 30 days of connectivity and it never worked. Two separate phone calls with AT&T; (approx. 75-80 minutes total) yielded nothing. They verified the SIM card and made me reboot several times (which I'd already done on my own before calling). They wanted me to put my SIM card into my cell phone to confirm the SIM card is the problem. Really? With the Kindle browser not working either, it's not the SIM card.Beautiful device, would love to use it (I love my original non-HD Kindle Fire). But it doesn't work. No Web surfing, no 4G (even AT&T; can't figure out why).UPDATE:Amazon customer service really tried. Had to blow everything away and go to factory reset, but that fixed everything. The reboot did the trick. Cost me about a week and some aggravation, but everything is working fine now. Raising my rating to 3 stars.
Reviews.Title: 4G doesn't work, Silk doesn't work

Reviews.Author: JMT "JMT"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire and the Kindle Fire 8.9 HD is a thousand times better in picture quqlity. Also, I like the Skype application.  A better buy for more money of course!
Reviews.Title: Love My New Kindle HD

Reviews.Author: Lucille I Edwards
Reviews.Content: Why didn't this product have a built in camera, everything has cameras now, to be able to take pictures you have to download a  Camera App, the app is not so great the pictures look like Skype pics, blurry. Hope I'm not giving misleading information, I did read the manual. Besides this I love my Kindle It works for the purpose It was bought for which is to look at UV movies in my idlling time. I also use it to play word games which you become so immersed into that your battery depletes before you know it, but you are given a warning about the nearing depletion, since the charging cord is only 5 feet long it's not feasible to be in a comfortable position  keeping it charged while playing your beloved games. I love my Kindle Fire,the color is alive and real just like a HD TV, I will be remiss in my review if I do not also rate the audio, which is  perfect. Everything else is positive. Thanks!
Reviews.Title: My Companion

Reviews.Author: neyda c.
Reviews.Content: Sound is louder when watching movies.Clearer pictures, no need for a laptop.Really like it and like the double charger
Reviews.Title: Greater features

Reviews.Author: Winnie
Reviews.Content: I really like ur product. I love ur customer service. I do hope u get candy crush that would be nice. But overall the kindle fire is GREAT!!! Thank you!!!
Reviews.Title: Wonderful

Reviews.Author: Linda A. Smith
Reviews.Content: I love the larger size of the kindle without the huge price of an ipad.  It holds lots of apps and books!
Reviews.Title: Perfect!

Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: My 10-year old son wanted this Kindle.  After much hesitation and research, we bought it. He loves it, I love it and am very pleased with the product.
Reviews.Title: Great product

Reviews.Author: H. Srock "Cheeseburger Extraordinaire"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" tablet after my laptop (an economy model hand-me-down) died in its sleep.  I had every intention of purchasing another laptop.  I had no interest in tablets, but my fiance convinced me that I would enjoy the convenience of a smaller device and a lower price point.  He was absolutely right.I use my Kindle every day.  I didn't think I would.  I didn't think it would be any different than my smartphone, but...I was very wrong.  The Overdrive Media Console application allows me to borrow digital books from my local library and I've become addicted to Cut The Rope.  If you can navigate your smartphone, this device will be a piece of cake.  I've even been shopping Bluetooth keyboards, because I do missing typing at times.  Ha!And, with accessories in mind, I will recommend theAmazon Kindle Fire HD 8.9" Standing Leather Case, Fuchsia (will only fit Kindle Fire HD 8.9").  It is a fun, basic protective case that "awakens" your table when you open it.  It's genius.
Reviews.Title: Skeptic Turned Believer.

Reviews.Author: AM
Reviews.Content: If you have eBooks on another machine, you can email them to your Kindle. If it's a recognized format, it will load them up.  This was painful the first few times since the formats weren't necessarily working and it would take a few tries to get it right.
Reviews.Title: Works well. Sending books from other sources can be painful though.

Reviews.Author: Antanas Malikenas
Reviews.Content: I like it but it is a little heavy. Easy to manage and get on the web. I would recommend it to people who read a lot and don't want to carry the Kindle with them. Downloaded the Dolphin browser so that I can watch YouTube and network TV on it.Negative -the charge last very long... and it goes down very rapidly.
Reviews.Title: good as expected

Reviews.Author: harleydude05
Reviews.Content: Item came in a new box, it was in like new condition.  The money I saved I bought a case and wall charger and screen protector.  And I still had extra left over.  Very easy to set up, just had to turn it on and enter my Wi-Fi password.  It walked me thru setup.  Great deal.
Reviews.Title: Just like new

Reviews.Author: Janet G.
Reviews.Content: This is like having a small computer. It is just what I wanted. I wanted a good quality item  I could use just sitting in my chair.
Reviews.Title: A great item for me.

Reviews.Author: amznShopper1976
Reviews.Content: It was  as good as new. there are no scratches or an physical problems. I would definitely recommend this anyone on a budget to consider a Certified Refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  (You do need to buy a charger. It does not come with one)Been using my Kindle for over a month and have not found anything. wrong with the item. It is considerable heavier than a 7 inch tablet. if you are worried about weight then i would suggest the 7in version. I personally love the size of the screen for reading books and gaming and can deal with the weight.The one thing i do not like is the placement of the power button. its right on the center.i find myself accidentally shutting the device if I am holding it sideways.
Reviews.Title: Certified Refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is as good as new one.

Reviews.Author: shycrow
Reviews.Content: I was quite content with my 1st generation Kindle Fire and had no desire for anything else. Then, through no fault of Amazon's I found myself in need of a new Kindle. After speaking with the top shelf Customer Support ,I was offered a discount on purchasing a new device and they helped me choose which Kindle was best for me. I am thrilled with my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9. It does everything my older Kindle did only better...plus a whole lot more. It's quality and technology are superb . Navigation is a breeze and it's very user friendly even for a tech challenged person such as myself. I love the longer battery life and the port for charging as well as on/off and volume buttons have better placement. Nothing negative to say.Just a wonderful quality product ! Thank you Amazon!
Reviews.Title: Just Love It!

Reviews.Author: H. Renert
Reviews.Content: Really terrific in many ways, Amazon books, even from public library are audio as well as visual. However, battery life much less than hyped. Also page direction management and pdf files ,management either with adobe or foxit not very good,
Reviews.Title: Great, but could improve

Reviews.Author: Freda B. Smith "lost without fire"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my kindles. For reading, social media, games, e-mail and ":surfing". This is  a definite take a-long when travelling. Everything is at my finger tips and easily stowed when not in use.
Reviews.Title: Kindle for me..........

Reviews.Author: Wayne Simpson
Reviews.Content: I have had a Kindle Fire since they first came out and really love it.  I upgraded to the Kindle Fire HD for the extra features and useability and I have not been disappointed.
Reviews.Title: amazing

Reviews.Author: Connie Best
Reviews.Content: This my 3rd generation Kindle. I have liked all of them, but the HD 8.9in makes everything so much easier to read. It's very easy to operate. Games on here are so colorful and easy to understand. My grandkids keep taking it when they are here. They bring their CD, but play my kindle. I have recommended to several people who are looking for something.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire HD

Reviews.Author: Scott Thompson
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture! Great for watching movies and playing games. Bought to replace the original kindle fire and am very happy with it
Reviews.Title: great update

Reviews.Author: Evie
Reviews.Content: The only problem I have with the Kindle Fire HD is where the charging outlet is.  I wish it was on one of the ends instead of the side.  When you have it standing up in the case with the landscape view and you need to charge it, you cant stand it up because of the plug in.  Other than that, no complaints at all.  :)
Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HD, only one problem

Reviews.Author: Jeanette
Reviews.Content: A Great value for the price , it does everything it promises and I am very pleased with this product.
Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hd 8.9

Reviews.Author: E. Ledbetter
Reviews.Content: I am really happy with this Kindle Fire HD 8.9".  It is great to have the larger screen, and this is nice while reading books, as well as all other information.  Like I said, I'm glad I bought it.
Reviews.Title: Glad I bought it.

Reviews.Author: Pier
Reviews.Content: I love this device! It absolutely met and exceeded my expectations. So glad I ordered it on Amazon. No ads, and it was already registered.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: priscilla jefferson
Reviews.Content: just don't leave home without it . I live and breathe for my Kindle had a few kinks in the beginning but now cool beans.
Reviews.Title: the best

Reviews.Author: PATRICIA Espinosa Ruiz "crazy for shops"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grand pa cause hi cant read small letters and this ítem was very confortable for him
Reviews.Title: So great

Reviews.Author: Rodney E.
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted!!! Does everything and more than I expected. Thank you Amazon Warehouse you made my birthday perfect!
Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9!!

Reviews.Author: Brenda S
Reviews.Content: Received this as a replacement for a broken 1st Gen Fire (power port issue)and love it.  Great size - not too big and not too small.  The HD picture is awesome for movies\videos\games\etc.  The sound is an improvement from the 1st Gen I had but could still sue some tweaking - love to see the speakers make it to the front somehow.  They are currently on the back side which means the case can cause some interruption in the quality of the sound.  If you use it without a case you have to be careful where you set it to not block the speakers.  The only other change would be the camera - it is currently located on the front (for use with Skype)which makes it very difficult to take pictures and videos are out....  They need to enable to camera to flip like the iPhone so you can use skype or take pics\video.  If those changes were made this table would be a 5 star piece of equipment.  JMHORecommed!
Reviews.Title: Good tablet!

Reviews.Author: Steve Fields "fields24"
Reviews.Content: After ordering the item I requested, next day shipping, (AmazonPrime) as a present, It was not SHIPPED UNTIL the NEXT DAY. Needless to say it was not received in "next day manner" but after 4 days. And I also found that the item, « to be given as a gift » was already pre-configured  with my account access and account history, with ability to order from MY Amazon account.This was nice to find out thanks to the fact that at least it for was for my adult daughter who warned me just after she booted it up and logged on.  Amazon needs to take more care in how they ship a desired item in such as a way since if someone else had picked up my delivered package from the porch they would have had full access to my Amazon Account. And had a field day with my account. They did at least refund the 3.99 for the special shipping. Thanks!Even if I had meant the tablet to go to a nephew or friend I still do not think that the things should be sent default , turned on,  and then find that they are in the Purchaser's account and ready to order more things FOR FREE.  Amazon Please fix this!!!!Besides all this: She loves it and is presently checking out what all it can do and laughing as she finds new features.
Reviews.Title: Dropped the ball on Next Day Delivery = Goofed by pre-configuring tablet with full open account access of buyers account.

Reviews.Author: Chas Mac
Reviews.Content: Best thing I bought in a long time,been using it for about a year can't put it down still after all this time.I do everything with it,music,video,apps,web,books This is a great one Amazon can't wait for the next one.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD!!!

Reviews.Author: Runhiker
Reviews.Content: My previous Kindle Generation One was stolen after several years of use and had to be replaced. I had noticed the three options in obtaining a new Kindle reader so when I saw this refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9 4G LTE with all the bells and whistles, I went for it and have not been disappointed. I still don't know or have used all its features but every now and than I try something else and am amazed at its capability. I decided to subscribe to Prime and that has added additional features that make my Kindle Fire even more amazing. I highly recommend it and I am quite pleased with my purchase.
Reviews.Title: Great Purchase!

Reviews.Author: Likes DS games "Ollie"
Reviews.Content: I bought a KINDLE reader with a keyboard when it came out and I loved it. Then Kindle Fire came out and I bought it and loved it. Then Kindle Fire HD 8.9 came out and I thought for 2 seconds "Do I need this?" And my answer was "Yes!" And I have enjoyed it every day since! I have Amazon Prime and watch shows. I look up things on the net.I have many apps games, stories for my grandchildren etc. ( Amazon offers a free app a day!) I check weather daily for home and other areas.I take it when I travel. I hardly ever turn on my computer. There are so many things it can do, just like a computer. I listen to my music. Read my books.  Check my mail.The screen is beautiful, the speakers great. You can Skype. As much as I love the first Fire, I love this more. Any age would enjoy this and find other uses I don't mention. Amazon help if you need it is EXCELLENT! They are always there for you. You can't go wrong with this item.
Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE

Reviews.Author: Poppy "est. 1998"
Reviews.Content: ...Have the 7" version.  Love the refurbished 8.9" model.  Had a couple of days when the WiFi connection was acting squirrely. Amazon support was patient and helpful.  May have been interference from a nearby neighbor, but the 7" model had no trouble.  Problem seems to be history.  Have received a new OS version as well as a new version of Silk.  The device is fast and easier to see and use vs. the 7" model.  Very happy, happy, happy.
Reviews.Title: easy on the eyes

Reviews.Author: Debby H "Debby"
Reviews.Content: I started out with a kindle keyboard that I received as a gift.  Loved it.  I ordered kindle HD 7" in January.  Loved it more and watched a lot of video.  Used my cash back bonus from a credit card to buy kindle HD 8.9.  That way I convinced myself that is was free, since this purchase was a total " I want it".  Great product easy to use.  Display clear and crisp.  Love reading watching video on larger format.  Highly recommend!
Reviews.Title: Use my Kindle all the time!

Reviews.Author: Virginia "I have always loved to read, just c...
Reviews.Content: When I received this item it was responsive with good picture. After a few uses it slowed down response time and will shut down on it's own and reboot from time to time. Otherwise good tablet for the price.
Reviews.Title: Kindle shut down

Reviews.Author: jan
Reviews.Content: I really like your business. Kindle quit working,  I called and got new replacement. I really like my kindles. Enjoy your business.
Reviews.Title: replacement

Reviews.Author: Dondra Cameron
Reviews.Content: I bought the kindle to read books, BUT so far I have only read 2 short stories.  I am having too muchfun catching up on TV series that I have missed, playing games that I love, reading my e-mail, etc.I intend to get around to reading books very soon.!
Reviews.Title: Love my kindle

Reviews.Author: curlybluelady "curlybluelady"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE this kindle-I just upgraded from my older one--what a HUGE difference-easier than the last yet more options-beautiful picture-camera-video-games apps--everything I wanted and more. I must add Customer service  person named Tauriq (?)was a terrific help in changing kindles-made it basically effortless-and at a great price-also scheduled a pickup by UPS of my old Kindle. It arrived the next day already charged-with most of my downloads already done for me,,,I only have 2 complaints--one--it doesn't come with the charger you will want to use so I ordered on for 19.99 today--and the delivery people just left it laying on my front porch-right out in the open-black box clearly marked. I cannot believe someone did not take it.Odd because amazon always has such good packaging-I get these huge boxes with plastic bubbles etc..and inside is a box of dog bones lol-don't know why they would leave this just laying on the cement facing my street  in no outer packaging?
Reviews.Title: HAPPY HAPPY JOY JOY

Reviews.Author: fightingducks
Reviews.Content: Have a Kindle reader but, my wife asked me if I had any interest in this. Had to act cool, she saw thru it, and on my birthday in May I got it. Can't put it down only wish I could get the Pac 12 thru Prime. Pay extra just for that.
Reviews.Title: For my birthday

Reviews.Author: P. Kuntz
Reviews.Content: My only disappointment is that I cannot open some web pages on the Fire.  The instructions for a workaround were confusing to me.  If I can solve this issue, I would rate it a 5.
Reviews.Title: Like it
